channel.title: Doors Help
channel.description: Need Help fixing doors i have tried to manually fix them but it doesnt seem to work i went in doors.cfg an changed the opening an closing but it doesnt work i have the correct id an facings its just i cant get it to work if someone could get on teamviewer an show me that would be great or if someone has a perfect doors.cfg they can spare that would work too please help :/

item.title: Doors Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

matzie:

You seem like a noob when it comes to programming(no offense). The reason this is a problem is because i would suggest rewriting the code to handle doors correctly. That is almost certainly out of your scope though If i had the time to work on a private server i would consider sitting down and making it work correctly. But until school is over and all of my programming assignments are turned in, I am kind of stripped of time.

Dude, if you’re not going to help a person, don’t respond.

OP:
The Doors.cfg was horribly written (I’m like 9/10 sure it was ripped from another system and converted).

Ths method is not much better, but in your case I think it should work…

rune-server.ee

[PI] Goodbye doors.cfg

Rune-Server

Read full topic

item.title: Doors Help
item.dc:creator: @grandstinger grandstinger
item.description:
@grandstinger wrote:

matzie:

You seem like a noob when it comes to programming(no offense). The reason this is a problem is because i would suggest rewriting the code to handle doors correctly. That is almost certainly out of your scope though If i had the time to work on a private server i would consider sitting down and making it work correctly. But until school is over and all of my programming assignments are turned in, I am kind of stripped of time.

He is having trouble figure something out and searches for help. and you just turn around and say that he is a “noob when it comes to programming”…
Why don’t you help him instead, since this is a help section. No need to be pulling him down.
If you have no time, then don’t post in the help section till you have time to be helping people, because you don’t seem to be helping him in any way.

Read full topic
